attributes.action: Increase our forces salary to decent level
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our Soldiers/Sailors/Airmen have to be the worst paid professional Force going in comparison to equivalent civilian jobs which are far less dangerous and demanding Please Mr Blair give them a decent salary for the work they do

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
